open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Durban North
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded and no connectivity for clients in Durban North. We are working with MetroFibre on identifying the issue. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: We are actively troubleshooting the root cause of the ongoing issue in Durban North. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Outage | Brakpan
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Brakpan, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
